input text: The Life on the Earth - The Summer of Dioxin ( Inochi No Chikyuu - Dioxin No Natsu), also known as Tracing the Gray Summer, is a 2001 Japanese anime drama film by Satoshi Dezaki, a joint production between the Magic Bus and the GoGo Visual Planning which recounts the true story of the Seveso disaster, a chemical incident occurred over the Italian town of Seveso in 1976, which is still considered one of the worst ecological disasters in history.
